=== Ternary Int Threading E2E Tests ===

--- Section 1: Basic ternary with int ---
ternaryInt = 5
ternaryFalse = 10

--- Section 2: Ternary int division (critical test) ---
7/2 via ternary = 3

--- Section 3: Nested ternary ---
nested = 2
deepNest = 20

--- Section 4: Ternary in function return ---
ternaryReturn(true) = 100
ternaryReturn(false) = 200

--- Section 5: Ternary with arithmetic ---
withArith = 15

--- Section 6: Assignment with ternary ---
mutableInt after assignment = 42

=== All tests completed ===
